name: df-fin
body: |- wceq(cfn, cab(s0, wrex(s1, com, wbr(cv(s0), cen, cv(s1)))))
comment: Define the (proper) class of all finite sets. Similar to Definition 10.29 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 91, whose "Fin(a)" corresponds to our " ` a e. Fin ` ". This definition is meaningful whether or not we accept the Axiom of Infinity ~ ax-inf2 . If we accept Infinity, we can also express ` A e. Fin ` by ` A ~< _om ` (theorem ~ isfinite .)
